quasarForms:
[{"name":"page","schema":{"title":"Quasar::page -- 
		builds out a single html page from a set of singular assets: css, html, js 
		with options to import files from an archived source
	","type":"object","required":["domain","signal"],"properties":{"domain":{"type":"string","title":"Enter the name of the domain to be used in building assets:
"},"signal":{"type":"string","title":"Enter the name of the signal to be used when compiling quasars:
"},"source":{"type":"string","title":"Enter the source filename (default .zip):
"},"body":{"type":"string","title":"Enter the body text"}}},"uiSchema":{"domain":{"ui:widget":"text","help":""},"signal":{"ui:widget":"text","help":""},"source":{"ui:widget":"file","help":""},"body":{"ui:widget":"text","help":""}}},{"name":"quasarWebform","schema":{"title":"Quasar::quasarWebform -- 
		builds a form using react and the json schema pulled directly from the available quasars 
		installed and allows you to run quasar build tasks with a web ui.
	","type":"object","required":[],"properties":{}},"uiSchema":{}}]
